verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G444>men<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> lovers of their own <S%G5367>selves,<s%> <S%G5366>covetous,<s%> <S%G213>boasters,<s%> <S%G5244>proud,<s%> <S%G989>blasphemers,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G884>unthankful,<s%> <S%G462>unholy,<s%>
Without natural <S%G794>affection,<s%> <S%G786>trucebreakers,<s%> false <S%G1228>accusers,<s%> <S%G193>incontinent,<s%> <S%G434>fierce,<s%> despisers of those that are <S%G865>good,<s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> a <S%G3446>form<s%> of <S%G2150>godliness,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G720>denying<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G846>thereof:<s%> from such turn <S%G665>away.<s%> <S%G5128><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> this <S%G5130>sort<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> they which <S%G1744>creep<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3614>houses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> lead <S%G162>captive<s%> silly <S%G1133>women<s%> <S%G4987>laden<s%> with <S%G266>sins,<s%> led <S%G71>away<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> they shall <S%G4298>proceed<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1909>further:<s%> <S%G4119><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G454>folly<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1552>manifest<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1565>theirs<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1096>was.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1114>seducers<s%> shall wax worse and <S%G4298>worse,<s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5501><s%> <S%G4105>deceiving,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> being <S%G4105>deceived.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3306>continue<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hast been assured <S%G4104>of,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> thou hast <S%G3129>learned<s%> them;

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> a <S%G1025>child<s%> thou hast <S%G1492>known<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2413>holy<s%> <S%G1121>Scriptures,<s%> which are <S%G1410>able<s%> to make thee <S%G4679>wise<s%> <S%G4571><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> is given by inspiration of <S%G2315>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G5624>profitable<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine,<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1650>reproof,<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1882>correction,<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G3809>instruction<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> righteousness: <S%G1343><s%>
